abilities.title: Skill Proficiencies
abilities.description: Insight, Religion

abilities.title: Languages
abilities.description: Two of your choice

abilities.title: Equipment
abilities.description: A holy symbol, a prayer book or prayer wheel, 5 sticks of incense, vestments, a set of common clothes, and a pouch containing 15 gp

abilities.title: Feature: Shelter of the Faithful
abilities.description: You command the respect of those who share your faith. You can perform religious ceremonies of your deity. You and your companions can receive free healing and care at a temple, shrine, or other established presence of your faith.

abilities.title: Skill Proficiencies
abilities.description: Deception, Sleight of Hand

abilities.title: Tool Proficiencies
abilities.description: Disguise kit, forgery kit

abilities.title: Equipment
abilities.description: A set of fine clothes, a disguise kit, tools of the con of your choice (ten stoppered bottles filled with colored liquid, a set of weighted dice, a deck of marked cards, or a signet ring of an imaginary duke), and a pouch containing 15 gp

abilities.title: Feature: False Identity
abilities.description: You have created a second identity that includes documentation, established acquaintances, and disguises that allow you to assume that persona.

abilities.title: Skill Proficiencies
abilities.description: Deception, Stealth

abilities.title: Tool Proficiencies
abilities.description: One type of gaming set, thieves' tools

abilities.title: Equipment
abilities.description: A crowbar, a set of dark common clothes including a hood, and a pouch containing 15 gp

abilities.title: Feature: Criminal Contact
abilities.description: You have a reliable and trustworthy contact who acts as your liaison to a network of other criminals.

abilities.title: Skill Proficiencies
abilities.description: Acrobatics, Performance

abilities.title: Tool Proficiencies
abilities.description: Disguise kit, one type of musical instrument

abilities.title: Equipment
abilities.description: A musical instrument of your choice, the favor of an admirer (love letter, lock of hair, or trinket), a costume, and a pouch containing 15 gp

abilities.title: Feature: By Popular Demand
abilities.description: You can always find a place to perform. You receive free lodging and food of a modest or comfortable standard as long as you perform each night.

abilities.title: Skill Proficiencies
abilities.description: Animal Handling, Survival

abilities.title: Tool Proficiencies
abilities.description: One type of artisan's tools, vehicles (land)

abilities.title: Equipment
abilities.description: A set of artisan's tools, a shovel, an iron pot, a set of common clothes, and a pouch containing 10 gp

abilities.title: Feature: Rustic Hospitality
abilities.description: Common folk will shelter you and hide you from the law or anyone searching for you. They will remember you if you help them.

abilities.title: Skill Proficiencies
abilities.description: Insight, Persuasion

abilities.title: Tool Proficiencies
abilities.description: One type of artisan's tools

abilities.title: Languages
abilities.description: One of your choice

abilities.title: Equipment
abilities.description: A set of artisan's tools, a letter of introduction from your guild, a set of traveler's clothes, and a pouch containing 15 gp

abilities.title: Feature: Guild Membership
abilities.description: Your guild membership gets you lodging and food, pays for your funeral, and can get you work. In some cities, a guildhall offers a central place to meet other members.

abilities.title: Skill Proficiencies
abilities.description: Medicine, Religion

abilities.title: Tool Proficiencies
abilities.description: Herbalism kit

abilities.title: Languages
abilities.description: One of your choice

abilities.title: Equipment
abilities.description: A scroll case stuffed full of notes from your studies or prayers, a winter blanket, a set of common clothes, an herbalism kit, and 5 gp

abilities.title: Feature: Discovery
abilities.description: Your isolation gave you access to a unique and powerful discovery.

abilities.title: Skill Proficiencies
abilities.description: History, Persuasion

abilities.title: Tool Proficiencies
abilities.description: One type of gaming set

abilities.title: Languages
abilities.description: One of your choice

abilities.title: Equipment
abilities.description: A set of fine clothes, a signet ring, a scroll of pedigree, and a purse containing 25 gp

abilities.title: Feature: Position of Privilege
abilities.description: You are welcomed in high society and people assume you have the right to be wherever you are.

abilities.title: Skill Proficiencies
abilities.description: Athletics, Survival

abilities.title: Tool Proficiencies
abilities.description: One type of musical instrument

abilities.title: Languages
abilities.description: One of your choice

abilities.title: Equipment
abilities.description: A staff, a hunting trap, a trophy from an animal you killed, a set of traveler's clothes, and a pouch containing 10 gp

abilities.title: Feature: Wanderer
abilities.description: You have an excellent memory for maps and geography. You can always recall the general layout of terrain, settlements, and other features around you.

abilities.title: Skill Proficiencies
abilities.description: Arcana, History

abilities.title: Languages
abilities.description: Two of your choice

abilities.title: Equipment
abilities.description: A bottle of black ink, a quill, a small knife, a letter from a dead colleague posing a question you have not yet been able to answer, a set of common clothes, and a pouch containing 10 gp

abilities.title: Feature: Researcher
abilities.description: When you attempt to learn or recall a piece of lore, if you do not know that information, you often know where and from whom you can obtain it.

abilities.title: Skill Proficiencies
abilities.description: Athletics, Perception

abilities.title: Tool Proficiencies
abilities.description: Navigator's tools, vehicles (water)

abilities.title: Equipment
abilities.description: A belaying pin (club), 50 feet of silk rope, a lucky charm, a set of common clothes, and a pouch containing 10 gp

abilities.title: Feature: Ship's Passage
abilities.description: When you need to, you can secure free passage on a sailing ship for yourself and your companions.

abilities.title: Skill Proficiencies
abilities.description: Athletics, Intimidation

abilities.title: Tool Proficiencies
abilities.description: One type of gaming set, vehicles (land)

abilities.title: Equipment
abilities.description: An insignia of rank, a trophy taken from a fallen enemy, a set of bone dice or deck of cards, a set of common clothes, and a pouch containing 10 gp

abilities.title: Feature: Military Rank
abilities.description: You have a military rank from your career as a soldier. Soldiers loyal to your former military organization still recognize your authority and influence.

abilities.title: Skill Proficiencies
abilities.description: Sleight of Hand, Stealth

abilities.title: Tool Proficiencies
abilities.description: Disguise kit, thieves' tools

abilities.title: Equipment
abilities.description: A small knife, a map of the city you grew up in, a pet mouse, a token to remember your parents by, a set of common clothes, and a pouch containing 10 gp

abilities.title: Feature: City Secrets
abilities.description: You know the secret patterns and flow to cities and can find passages through the urban sprawl that others would miss.
